translations.icons_text: Front offers a variety of popular icon sets.
translations.iterate_numerical_text: Iterate over a series of numbers using a variable and optionally a set of keywords to specify the step size and bounds.
translations.iterate_json_text: Iterate through a JSON data structure using a datasource.
translations.languages_text: The documentation is available in the following languages:
translations.name: Name
translations.title1_sub: Unleash the power of Markup Language using FTML in easy or advanced solutions. Front helps create beautiful, fast, and responsive layouts for multiple devices in no-time.
translations.icons_description: Front offers a variety of popular icon sets.
translations.installation_automatic_description: Set up development environment automatically using GIT and the CLI tool.
translations.installation_manual_description: Set up development environment manually step by step.
translations.showcase_description: Customers using Front to power up their applications.
translations.speed_performance_description:
Front is one of the fastest platforms on the web development market.
One of the main objectives is to achieve the maximum speed and performance possible through constant optimizations of the source code.
translations.marketplace_description: Buy, sell or give away items for free.
translations.cross_platform_description: At the moment, the platform is undergoing a valuation phase.
translations.open_source_description: Front is a free and open-source project provided under the MIT license. The source code is also available, which you can explore in detail or fork and modify to suit your needs.
translations.paradigm_description: Low-code approach has a minimalistic logic making it easy for developers to understand and maintain. Combining imperative and declarative style creates a new way of coding in abstractive mode.
